The  minutes  of  the  said  Management  Committee  meeting  dated  20.01.2011,

column2: The  Dean  informed  the  Committee  that  he  has  dissolved  the  Ethics  Committee  with
immediate  effect  in  the  best  interests  of  the  faculty.  Prof.  P.L.  Jayawardena  and  Dr.
